benefits.title: Why Choose Us
benefits.subtitle: Experience premium transportation services tailored to your needs

fixedPrices.title: Fixed Prices
fixedPrices.description: No surprises, no hidden fees. Know exactly what you'll pay in advance.

flightTracking.title: Flight Tracking
flightTracking.description: We monitor your flight and adjust pickup time based on actual arrival.

professionalDrivers.title: Professional Drivers
professionalDrivers.description: Experienced, punctual drivers who know the local routes and speak English.

comfortableVehicles.title: Comfortable Vehicles
comfortableVehicles.description: Travel in style with our fleet of premium, well-maintained vehicles.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our team is always available to assist with any questions or changes.

noWaiting.title: No Waiting
noWaiting.description: Your driver will be waiting for you, even if your flight is delayed.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Premium transportation solutions for all your travel needs

airport.title: Airport Transfers
airport.description: Door-to-door service between airports and your destination with flight tracking and free waiting time.

intercity.title: Intercity Transfers
intercity.description: Comfortable transfers between cities with experienced drivers who know the best routes.

group.title: Group Transfers
group.description: Spacious vehicles for groups of all sizes, ensuring everyone travels together comfortably.

bookingProcess.title: How It Works
bookingProcess.subtitle: Book your premium transfer in just a few easy steps

step1.title: Book Online
step1.description: Enter your trip details and select a vehicle that suits your needs.

step2.title: Instant Confirmation
step2.description: Receive immediate confirmation with all your transfer details.

step3.title: Meet Your Driver
step3.description: Your professional driver will be waiting at the agreed pickup location.

step4.title: Enjoy Your Ride
step4.description: Relax in comfort as we take you safely to your destination.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from travelers who have experienced our premium service
testimonials.quote1: Outstanding service, polite drivers, and perfect timing! Our transfers were smooth and stress-free. Highly recommend Royal Transfer!
testimonials.quote2: Excellent experience from start to finish. The driver was professional and the vehicle was immaculate. Will definitely use again!
testimonials.quote3: Reliable and punctual service. The booking process was simple and the driver was very helpful with our luggage.
